synopsis.text:
Episodes of "Hand Shakers" unfold in the futuristic cityscape of Osaka, where select duos, known as Hand Shakers, can manifest powerful weapons called Nimrodes by joining hands. These Nimrodes are physical manifestations of their deepest desires and psyches. In a quest to have their one true wish granted, Hand Shaker pairs engage in fierce battles against one another. The ultimate victors will earn the right to challenge the divine entity known as "God."

Tazuna, a high school student with a knack for repairing machines, finds himself drawn into this fantastical world after accepting a repair request from a university lab. Upon meeting Koyori, a bedridden girl, he unknowingly forms a Hand Shaker bond with her, and they materialize their Nimrod.

Now, Tazuna and Koyori must navigate the enigmatic realm of Ziggurat, where time stands still, and Hand Shaker pairs clash in a battle royale. As they struggle to comprehend their new reality, they are suddenly ambushed by a mysterious assailant. With Koyori's life depending on Tazuna's unwavering grip, the duo must learn to harness their unique powers and outmaneuver their adversaries in order to secure a chance at obtaining their heartfelt wish.
